data.name: Train Chase
data.description:
You're being chased by the enemy and have to escape.
Fight their drones, turrets and vehicles on a train through several levels and several waves.

You can choose between the Story or the Wave Mode. In Story Mode, you have to go through multiple level after another and defeat the end bosses in each level.

In the Wave Mode, you encounter waves of enemies and during a pause, you can buy new weapons.

Use different types of weapons to deal as much as damage with the least amount of bullets. 
You can pick between a pistol, a shotgun, a machine gun and a grenade launcher.

Dodge their attacks during the bullet time.
The bullet time activates as soon as a enemy bullet gets close, dodge it by physically moving in the room while the time is slowed down.

translations.long_description:
Du wirst von dem Feind verfolgt und musst entkommen.
Kämpfe gegen Dronen, Geschütze und Fahrzeuge auf einen Zug durch verschiedene Level und mehreren Wellen von Gegnern.

Dabei kannst du entscheiden ob du den Story Modus oder den Wellen Modus auswählst. Im Story Modus musst du mehrere Level hintereinander beenden und dann die Endgegner besiegen.

Im Wellen Modus wirst du Wellen von Gegnern begegnen die du besiegen musst. Während den Pausen kannst du dein Equipment verbessern.

Benutze verschiedene Arten von Waffen um viel Schaden mit wenigen Schüssen zu machen.
Du kannst wählen zwischen einer Pistole, Shotgun, Maschinengewehr sowie einen Granatenwerfer.

Weiche die Schüsse der Gegner während der Slowmotion aus. Die Slowmotion lässt die Zeit verlangsamen, wodurch es dir leicht fallen sollt, gegnerische Kugeln auszuweichen. Die Zeit wird langsamer, sobald eine Kugel dabei ist dich zu treffen.

changelog.change_log: Improved Loading and Saving of SaveGames
Added Display in Main Menu for shot enemies.

- Added Vignette and Vignette FOV Option
- Added new Rhine Games Logo
- Comfort Warning is now always facing the player
- Reduced MSAA for additional performance gains
- Points Text are now appearing less, but add up together
- Opening the pause menu now requires a tap
- MP5 Cooldown has been reduced
- Leaderboard size has been reduced to avoid the Scrollbar
- Both Weapons share now the same Ammo
- Improved Performance in Industry Level
- Improved Performance for Explosions
- Fixed Rating at the End of a Level not always working
- Fixed Wave Levels not unlocking
- Reduced Bullet Recovery Time, now gameplay should be much faster
- Fix Speed Effect not visible when not looking at it

New
- Added Weapon Menu at the start of a story level
- Added new Blink Effect for Enemies
- Added new level based on the game Neon Valley Revenge
- Added Neon Weapon Skin
- Added Ammo Icon to Weapon Menu
- Quest 3 Controller Images
- Quest 3 now has improved graphics
- Quest 3 now has improved haptics
- Quest 3 running at 90 Hz
- Added new Intro

Improvements
- Terrain should not change based on distance anymore
- Health of all enemies has been adjusted
- Enemy Hiteffect is now based on the remaining health
- Increased offset for Non-VR Dodging
- Added additional buttons to interact with the menu
- Improved Performance for Quest
- Fixed some Lighting issues on Turret and Train Wagons
- Grenade Launcher now deals more damage

New Issues
- Save Games System changed, resulting in a loss of the saves. Join the Discord Server and I'll help you

- Fixed MP5 Lighting
- Added Tutorial to Story
- Fixed a Typo in German Translation
